name: nuclide-debugger-php
description: Allows debugging of PHP from Nuclide

attachScriptRegex.title: Script Path Filter Regexp
attachScriptRegex.description: Regular expression to filter connection script path.  Only applies to connections when in attach mode.

idekeyRegex.title: Connection IDE Key Regexp
idekeyRegex.description: Regular expression to filter connection idekey. Usually your OS user id.  Only applies to connections when in attach mode.

xdebugAttachPort.title: DBGP Attach Port
xdebugAttachPort.description: Port for DBGP connection to HHVM running in server mode.

xdebugLaunchingPort.title: DBGP Launch Port
xdebugLaunchingPort.description: Port for DBGP connection to HHVM used for launching scripts.

phpRuntimePath.title: Path to your PHP runtime
phpRuntimePath.description: Path to the PHP runtime on your server.

phpRuntimeArgs.title: Arguments for your PHP runtime
phpRuntimeArgs.description: Arguments to call the PHP runtime with, e.g. to pass a config file.

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Specify that level of logging from debugger, supported values: ALL | TRACE | DEBUG | INFO | WARN | ERROR | FATAL | OFF.

stopOneStopAll.title: Stop one, stop all
stopOneStopAll.description: Specifies whether we stop all requests once we hit a breakpoint
